mapper.select: SELECT cc.company_comment_no AS companyCommentNo, cc.company_comment_content AS companyCommentContent, cc.member_unique_no AS memberUniqueNo, m.member_nickname AS memberNickname, cc.company_comment_date AS companyCommentDate, cc.company_item_no AS companyItemNo, cc.company_unique_no AS companyUniqueNo FROM mini_market_company_comment AS cc INNER JOIN mini_market_member AS m ON cc.member_unique_no = m.member_unique_no WHERE company_item_no = #{companyItemNo} ORDER BY company_comment_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow} , #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mini_market_company_comment WHERE company_item_no = #{companyItemNo}
